name: Carbogen Amcis - Cholesterol NF
description: Carbogen Amcis is a Swiss pharmaceutical and cosmetic ingredient supplier offering pharmaceutical-grade Cholesterol NF with cGMP certification. Their cholesterol serves as an excellent emulsifying agent in cosmetic preparations and powerful moisturizer in skin conditioning cosmetics, available in multiple grades for pharmaceutical, cosmetic, and nutritional applications.
products: Cholesterol HP (High Purity for liposomal formulations)
notes: Swiss pharmaceutical-grade supplier with cGMP certification. Offers multiple cholesterol grades including standard Cholesterol NF and high-purity Cholesterol HP specifically designed for liposomal formulations. Excellent choice for premium barrier repair formulations requiring pharmaceutical-grade quality.
